channel.title: Comments on: ‘India Out’ campaign in Maldives intensifies with Yameen’s backing – Chaddi comments are topkek

item.title: By: SuicidalTorrent
item.dc:creator: SuicidalTorrent
item.description: Apparently their government officially rejects the movement.
item.content:encoded: Apparently their government officially rejects the movement.

item.title: By: El_Drago7
item.dc:creator: El_Drago7
item.description: That guy in right side (red tshirt) is possibly laughing at these chaddi comments.
item.content:encoded: That guy in right side (red tshirt) is possibly laughing at these chaddi comments.

item.title: By: kitetshirt
item.dc:creator: kitetshirt
item.description:
It is a great opportunity to explain to chaddis that it is unfair to ask an immigrant to leave who has put years of labour to a country's economy at an lower wage and with less rights than the country's citizen while simultaneously paying sales or vat tax in many cases indirectly(the cost of sales tax is shifted to consumer and not company owners).This is taxation without representation.
And how leaders in trying to hide their own failures in job creation and GDP growth blame and demonise groups like immigrants.
item.content:encoded:
It is a great opportunity to explain to chaddis that it is unfair to ask an immigrant to leave who has put years of labour to a country’s economy at an lower wage and with less rights than the country’s citizen while simultaneously paying sales or vat tax in many cases indirectly(the cost of sales tax is shifted to consumer and not company owners).This is taxation without representation.

And how leaders in trying to hide their own failures in job creation and GDP growth blame and demonise groups like immigrants.
